body:
This is the future home of [www.dfjs.co.uk](http://www.dfjs.co.uk)

We'll be posting some of the projects & prototypes we've been working on in due course, on and in which we've been using some new/old/interesting web technologies, including: 

* Front-end: [Meteor](http://www.meteor.com/), [jQuery](http://www.jquery.com/) & [jQuery UI](http://jqueryui.com/), [Twitter's Bootstrap](http://twitter.github.com/bootstrap/)
* Browser stuff: HTML4 & HTML5 (GeoLocation, Filesystem,..), 'Apps'
* Device (in)dependent: Responsive Design, Touch-based interfaces
* Other interesting projects and services: [Jekyll](https://github.com/mojombo/jekyll/) and [Prose](http://prose.io/) (this site)

Also (just about) on [Twitter as @dfjsc](http://twitter.com/dfjsc)

Contact info:
information [ at ] dfjs . co . uk
Based in London and Hong Kong ([partner](http://www.skynet.com.hk/))
UK Company Number: 07781603
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: DFJS Consulting Ltd
tagline: Software + Technical Development and Consulting services across business domains, utilising Open Source and Proprietary software.
